message: It's Koujaku who breaks the silence.

name: 紅雀
message: "I don't understand what's going on, but is that really the only way?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's the only idea I've got."

name: 紅雀
message: "And you're gonna do it, even knowing how dangerous it is?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. If you guys hadn't showed up, I'd have tried it on my own. I have to save him. I have to."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I know it's dangerous... but I can't give up."

name: 紅雀
message: "...Alright. If you're that sure, I'm not gonna stop you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Listen, you guys gotta help out too!"

name: クリア
message: "Of course!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Be lame to back out now."

name: ミンク
message: "Let's get it done."
A warmth spreads through my chest. I went through such hell to get here... but now, they have my back.

name: 紅雀
message: "Hey. They're coming!"
The guards and their Allmates are making their move.

name: ミンク
message: "Hey, nerd. Make sure he doesn't get logged out while he's in Scrap."

name: ノイズ
message: "I'm not a fucking nerd."

name: ミンク
message: "Red, gas mask. Take out anyone who gets close."
After issuing his orders, Mink strides toward the guards and Allmates.
And then he starts smashing them flat.

name: ノイズ
message: "Let's get this party started."
Noiz sits down, opens a screen on his Coil, and gets to work.

name: 紅雀
message: "Hey, how are you gonna Scrap yourself?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I dunno. But I have to try."
I get down on my knees, close my eyes, and try to concentrate.
But there's too much going on around me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Shit. I can't focus."

name: 紅雀
message: "What if you cover your ears?"
I try covering my ears with my hands, but I can still hear the noise.
It doesn't help that I'm also tense as hell.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Nope."

name: クリア
message: "So the noise is bothering you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."
